item.title: Breaking the rules of Hueforge
item.description:
About a year ago I’ve come across Hueforge, which is a great software for turning 2D images into 3D prints. I’ve experimented with it a little bit, and got some nice results. Here’s the very first image I’ve tried and the result I got:

(Original from dunaipoly.hu)

I was sceptical going into this: why use a 3D printer to print something 2D?! I changed my mind quickly. There’s something satisfying about transforming a 2D image into a physical, three-dimensional object.
